headline: Warner Bros Discovery to lay off 10% of film group, source says
summary: LOS ANGELES (Reuters) -Warner Bros Discovery will lay off roughly 10% of its motion picture group employees as part of a restructuring before the company splits in two, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday. In a memo to staff, Motion Picture Group Co-Chairs Pamela Abdy and Michael De Luca said company leadership had started reviewing the film group's operations in early 2025. Warner Bros Discovery has announced plans to separate into two publicly traded companies.
